text: The following is a list of episodes for the second season of BN Pictures' Aikatsu Friends! television series, Aikatsu Friends! Brilliant Jewel, which aired on TV Tokyo from April 4, 2019 to September 26, 2019. The opening theme is by Aine, Mio, Maika and Ema while the ending theme is "Be star" by Hibiki from Best Friends. ==Episode list== ==References== Category:Aikatsu! Category:Aikatsu! episode lists Category:2019 Japanese television seasons
title: Aikatsu Friends! (season 2)
